descriptionHtml:
The only deal breaker to me when it comes to playing with an Argonian/Khajiit race is the tail. This may seem stupid but I don\'t like having a tail on my character, even if he/she is a feline or a lizard.
This mod will simply make the Argonians tail invisible so that people like me can enjoy this race benefits.

Other mods:
Khajiit Tail Remover - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4390

How to Install/Uninstall:

Automatic:
My mods are compatible with Nexus Mod Manager, I recommend it to Install/Uninstall any compatible mod.

Manually:
- To install simply copy the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim directory;
- To uninstall simply delete the files you copied;

ATTENTION! This mod should be compatible with any other body mods as long as they don\'t edit ArgonianTail .nif.

- Report any bugs you may find in the comments and I\'ll look them up asap.

Hope you enjoy!
Tiago.

---

1.0.0 - Female and Male Argonian Meshs and Textures changed; Tail should be fully invisible.
author: tiagopsyko
